name: North Beach Citizens
description: North Beach Citizens utilizes the talents of the community to innovatively address the needs of its homeless and low-income citizens in an atmosphere of trust, integrity, and respect. Our programs are designed with a holistic focus on the well-being of those that we serve, bringing food, housing, and stability to those who need it most.
